project.name: kollavarsham
project.description: Convert Gregorian date to Kollavarsham date and vice versa

date.name: date
date.description: Defines the KollavarshamDate and another private class

kollavarsham.name: kollavarsham
kollavarsham.description: The main module that exposes all of the public API in the library

Kollavarsham.name: Kollavarsham
Kollavarsham.description:
The Kollavarsham class implements all the public APIs of the library.

Create a new instance of this class, passing in the relevant options and call methods on this instance.

params.name: options
params.description: A set of key value pairs to configure the Kollavarsham instance. All settings are optional.

props.name: bija
props.description: Set this to true to use the Bija correction

props.name: latitude
props.description: Sets the latitude for the location for the conversions

props.name: longitude
props.description: Sets the longitude for the location for the conversions

props.name: outputformat
props.description: Set to 'list' or 'verbose' for the output

classitems.description: Pads zeroes to print the date in a pretty format
Converts the Kollavarsham Date to a nicely formatted string with year, month and date
classitems.name: toString

classitems.description: Returns the output string (that is probably relevant only from the CLI perspective)
classitems.name: print

classitems.description: Holds the settings state of the Kollavarsham instance. To access a snapshot use the {{#crossLink "Kollavarsham/getSettings:method"}}{{/crossLink}} method
classitems.name: _settings

classitems.description: Gets a snapshot of the current settings
classitems.name: getSettings

return.description: The current snapshot of the settings/configuration

classitems.description: Sets the mode of conversion - from Gregorian to Malayalam Era or vice versa. `0`and `1` (any non-zero value is considered as 1) are valid values
classitems.name: setMode

params.name: mode
params.description: A value of `0` will do Gregorian to Malayalam Era and a value of `1` (or any non-zero value) will do Malayalam Era date to Gregorian

classitems.description: Sets or unsets the Bija factor
classitems.name: setBija

classitems.description: Sets the latitude for the location that will be used as the basis for the conversion
classitems.name: setLatitude

classitems.description: Sets the longitude for the location that will be used as the basis of the conversion
classitems.name: setLongitude

classitems.description: Sets the output to be as 'list' or 'verbose'
classitems.name: setOutput

classitems.description: Sets the input Gregorian date for conversion
classitems.name: setInputDate

classitems.description: Converts a Gregorian date to the equivalent Kollavarsham date, respecting the current configuration
classitems.name: fromGregorianDate

params.name: date
params.description: The Gregorian date to be converted to Kollavarsham

classitems.description:
Converts a Kollavarsham date to its equivalent Gregorian date, respecting the current configuration
**This API is still work in progress**
classitems.name: toGregorianDate

params.name: date
params.description: The Kollavarsham date to be converted to Gregorian

classitems.description:
Exports the {{#crossLink "KollavarshamDate"}}{{/crossLink}} class for referencing via `require`. This is the class
that is returned when converting {{#crossLink "Kollavarsham/fromGregorianDate:method"}}{{/crossLink}} and is passed in
to {{#crossLink "Kollavarsham/toGregorianDate:method"}}{{/crossLink}}. See example below.
classitems.name: kollavarshamDate
